items.title: Coaching Employees for Performance Improvement

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course explores right and wrong ways to coach employees and address performance deficiencies.
objectives_summary: Explore the varied impact that well-planned or poorly-executed  performance management can have on employee morale, the business’ overall performance, and the company’s reputation.
Discover a clear, concise and consistent approach to communicate and document employee performance improvement conversations.

Recognize the importance of clear documentation to provide the employee for further reference and to demonstrate to third parties, such as state/federal agencies or attorneys, that the conversation and expectations were reasonable and fair.

items.headline: Develop and implement an effective employee motivation strategy without involving salaries or bonuses
objectives_summary: You will understand the critical role of the human resources department in designing an effective strategy to motivate employees
You will be able to design and implement an effective and comprehensive non-financial motivation strategy for employees
You will know how you can improve the current ways of motivating the employees you have implemented

items.title: Remote Onboarding For New Hires

items.headline: An Employee Onboarding Program To Kickstart Engagement, Collaboration And High Performance
objectives_summary: Create a comprehensive remote onboarding program for your company.
Anticipate and navigate the remote workplace scenarios that impact onboarding success.
Design meaningful and collaborative learning experiences for new hires.
